sn2.2:1.2: Standing to one side, the god Kassapa recited this verse in the Buddha’s presence:
sn2.2:2.1: “Suppose a mendicant is a meditator, freed in mind.
sn2.2:2.2: If they want to reach the heart’s peace,
sn2.2:2.3: having known the arising and passing of the world,
sn2.2:2.4: healthy-minded, independent, that is their reward.”
